org.x2d.zuul
Class CommandTake

java.lang.Object
  org.x2d.zuul.CommandWord
      org.x2d.zuul.CommandTake

public class CommandTake
extends CommandWord

Command word take. This command is used when the player is trying to take an item and put it into the backpack.
